data.title: 2427 Loma Vista St House, Pasadena, CA
meta_keywords: architecture urban planning design landscape interiors buildings structures history biography reference source encyclopedia
data.meta_description: Read about 2427 Loma Vista St House, Pasadena, CA -- historical significance, designers, and related information (structure type: built works - dwellings - houses) .
data.text:
The residence at 2427 Loma Vista Street, Pasadena, CA, contained 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, and had 1,487 square feet. It occupied a 7,248-square-foot lot. The house had an asking price by house flippers of $649,000 in 06/2011, and reduced to $634,000 in 09/2011. The building sold for $589,000 on 12/02/2011.

PCAD id: 19132
